options.content: The 'Status' panel shows an overview on the cluster health over the time. To investigate failures, see a specific dashboard: - Writes - Reads - Rule evaluations - Alerting notifications - Object storage

targets.expr:
((
    # gRPC errors are not tracked as 5xx but "error".
    sum(histogram_count(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-write.*))", route=~"/distributor.Distributor/Push|/httpgrpc.*|api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics",status_code=~"5.*|error"}[$__rate_interval])))
    or
    # Handle the case no failure has been tracked yet.
    vector(0)
)
/
sum(histogram_count(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-write.*))", route=~"/distributor.Distributor/Push|/httpgrpc.*|api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics"}[$__rate_interval])))
) and on() (vector($latency_metrics) == -1)

((
    # gRPC errors are not tracked as 5xx but "error".
    sum(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-write.*))", route=~"/distributor.Distributor/Push|/httpgrpc.*|api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics",status_code=~"5.*|error"}[$__rate_interval]))
    or
    # Handle the case no failure has been tracked yet.
    vector(0)
)
/
sum(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-write.*))", route=~"/distributor.Distributor/Push|/httpgrpc.*|api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics"}[$__rate_interval]))
) and on() (vector($latency_metrics) == 1)

((
    # gRPC errors are not tracked as 5xx but "error".
    sum(histogram_count(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+",status_code=~"5.*|error"}[$__rate_interval])))
    or
    # Handle the case no failure has been tracked yet.
    vector(0)
)
/
sum(histogram_count(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+"}[$__rate_interval])))
) and on() (vector($latency_metrics) == -1)

((
    # gRPC errors are not tracked as 5xx but "error".
    sum(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+",status_code=~"5.*|error"}[$__rate_interval]))
    or
    # Handle the case no failure has been tracked yet.
    vector(0)
)
/
sum(rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|mimir-read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+"}[$__rate_interval]))
) and on() (vector($latency_metrics) == 1)

(
  (
      sum(rate(cortex_prometheus_rule_evaluation_failures_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ruler|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[$__rate_interval]))
      +
      # Consider missed evaluations as failures.
      sum(rate(cortex_prometheus_rule_group_iterations_missed_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ruler|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[$__rate_interval]))
  )
  or
  # Handle the case no failure has been tracked yet.
  vector(0)
)
/
sum(rate(cortex_prometheus_rule_evaluations_total{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((ruler|cortex|mimir|mimir-backend.*))"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content: These panels show an overview on the write path. To examine the write path in detail, see a specific dashboard: - Writes - Writes resources - Writes networking - Overview resources - Overview networking

These panels show an overview on the read path. To examine the read path in detail, see a specific dashboard: - Reads - Reads resources - Reads networking - Overview resources - Overview networking - Queries - Compactor

These panels show an overview on the recording and alerting rules evaluation. To examine the rules evaluation and alerts notifications in detail, see a specific dashboard: - Ruler - Alertmanager - Alertmanager resources - Overview resources - Overview networking

panels.title: Alerting notifications sent to Alertmanager / sec

options.content: These panels show an overview on the long-term storage (object storage). To examine the storage in detail, see a specific dashboard: - Object store - Compactor

panels.title: Total number of blocks in the storage

list.description: Choose between showing latencies based on low precision classic or high precision native histogram metrics.
list.label: Latency metrics
list.name: latency_metrics
